TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how a will gain additional rows or columns after its existing cells are full.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are filled and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is set to FixedSize, an attempt to add another control will throw an exception.
## Examples The following example shows how to use TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
[!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#7](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.windows.forms.t_9_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#7](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.windows.forms.t_9_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle AddColumns = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle AddRows = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle FixedSize = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The does not allow additional rows or columns after it is full.
